channel.title: TGRoss
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGRoss, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Cash is Still Pouring In
item.description: Hey, Ross here! US money market funds just hit a record $7 trillion, with cash pouring in from across the globe. Clearly, Trump’s impact has been posi...

item.title: This Chart Tells Me It’s “Risk On” for the Markets
item.description: Hey, Ross here! Take a look at this: BlackRock’s Bitcoin ETF just surpassed the size of its Gold ETF. With Bitcoin rallying sharply, this gap has like...

item.title: How Trump is Setting Investors up for Success
item.description: Hey, Ross here! We’re just over two years into this bull market, with the S&P 500 already up around 65%. While that might feel like things are getting...

item.title: The “Risk Hungry” Money is Pouring In
item.description: Hey, Ross here! Historically, inflows into stock funds are quiet before a Presidential election and surge afterward. But this year’s been different—st...
